purple.description: Not part of design system, only used for annotating designs

green.description: Not part of design system, only used for annotating page templates for designers

pink.description: Not part of design system, only used for annotating page templates for designers

sm.description: Buttons, navigation, and other UI components.

lg.description: Display, heading and long form body text.

50.description: Used as a background overlay to mute the background when another layer (e.g. modal, drawer) is opened.
